legal_basis: Section 96 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Section 147 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution due to membership in a minority clan
decision_reasoning: applicant faced general insecurity rather than persecution
had a viable Internal Flight Alternative (IFA) in Somaliland
evidence_assessment: evidence showed the applicant feared persecution due to membership in a minority clan
conclusion_outcome: Officer's decision unreasonable and legally erroneous
result_of_case: referred to another immigration officer for reassessment
